ygData.subject: Re: Pottery?? The unknown art form, hehe
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehe, its an enchanter thing mainly because a spell we need (our animation spell) is available ONLY in Highpass hold... starting at level 8.  Its similar to
ygData.messageBody:
Hehe, its an enchanter thing mainly because a spell we need (our
animation spell) is available ONLY in Highpass hold... starting at level
8. Its similar to the reason all enchanters goto Neriak around level
8-12... the only place we can get the enchant silver / electrum / gold /
platinum spells is in neriak and we gotta go get it.

Shads/Shadus/Shaid -- Strangely all enchanters =)

On Fri, 30 Apr 1999, TRAVISL wrote:

> From: TRAVISL <TRAVIS@...>
> Please tell... What do you mean by this? It seems you are saying that
> Enchanters frequent HighPass? Beginning at level 8? Why in the world would
> a level 8 character of ANY type want to frequent HighPass? Is this "an
> enchanter thing?"
